docs.title: ezLuaEngine
docs.text: ezLuaEngine is a WIP engine for web games with a focus on simplicity.

docs.title: API Reference
docs.text: This is the lua API reference for the ezLuaEngine

docs.title: _update()
docs.text: This function will be called by the engine every frame. Do all processing and frame drawing here.

docs.title: getKey(key-name)
docs.text: Tests to see if the key at the position indicatd by the key name is pressed. Keys are referenced by scancode so control layout will remain constant even with non-QUERTY keyboard layouts. Key names correlate with the table at https://wiki.libsdl.org/SDL2/SDL_Scancode.

docs.title: drawRect(x, y, width, height, {r, g, b})
docs.text: Draw a rectangle starting from the top left at (x,y) with the given dimensions and color.

docs.title: drawImage(path, x, y, width_scale, height_scale)
docs.text:
Draw the image at the provided path starting from the top left at (x,y), stretched by a factor of width_scale and height_scale.

An image foo.png placed in the assets folder can be found at /game-files/assets/foo.png

docs.title: Quickstart
docs.text:
To compile a game, type source configure followed by make run while in the base folder of the project. This will compile the engine and package all the files from the game-files folder into the game and open a browser to show the game in action.

The build folder will contain the compiled game, which can be freely rehosted.
